io.kool.stream
Extensions on java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService

extension functions on class java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService
from package io.kool.stream

Function Summary
fun ScheduledExecutorService scheduleAtFixedRateStream(period: Long, [initialDelay: Long, unit: TimeUnit]): ScheduledFutureStream
Creates a Stream of timer events to occur at a fixed rate execution with given period and optional initialDelay
fun ScheduledExecutorService scheduleStream(delay: Long, [unit: TimeUnit]): Stream<Long>
Creates a Stream of a single time event to occur at the given delay
fun ScheduledExecutorService scheduleWithFixedDelayStream(period: Long, [initialDelay: Long, unit: TimeUnit]): ScheduledFutureStream
Creates a Stream of timer events to occur at a fixed delay execution with given period and optional initialDelay
